00167 inline unsigned char &Clip::operator() (const unsigned int &row, const unsigned int &column)
00168 {
00169     if ( (row < 0) or (column < 0) or (row >= height_) or (column >= width_) )
00170         throw NessieException ("Clip::operator() : Subscripts are out bounds");
00171         
00172     return pixels_[row * width_ + column];
00173 };
00174

00182         throw NessieException ("Clip::operator() : Subscripts are out bounds");
00183         
00184     return pixels_[row * width_ + column];
